alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:57PM EDT until March 15 at 12:09AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... White River at Hazleton. Wabash River from Riverton to Mount Carmel. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the lower White into Tuesday and along the Wabash into Thursday. River levels are falling along both rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Floodwaters cover much low ground in agricultural season. Low lying oil fields...Pottsville Road and possibly a few other low rural roads flood. High water isolates Pottstown, a river cabin community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.2 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by Tuesday afternoon.
